jobs_results.title: Business Analyst Manager (Digital)
Test Analyst
jobs_results.description:
• Join an IT services company with strong history of success
• Work alongside a talented team
• Excellent career development opportunities

Founded by a team with over 20 years of IT experience, our client supports businesses who outsource their IT functions, with their ability in cross-application connectivity.

The Job

You will be responsible for :
• Defining scope of testing and applying appropriate test metrics
• Creating test plans, test scenarios, test cases and test reports
• Executing test cases and verifying test results
• Ensuring issues are resolved and logged in a timely manner
• Ensuring visibility, traceability, and control of testing process

The Profile
• You have a Degree/Diploma in Computer Science, Engineering or similar field
• You have at least 1 year experience in a Quality Assurance/Testing role.
• You have experience in web and mobile apps
• You have a good understanding of end to end testing process
• ISTQB certification or equivalent is preferred
• You... demonstrate high commitment to drive completion of planned works
• You have effective verbal and written communication skills
• You pay strong attention to details and deliver work of high standards
• You are a strong team player and can liaise with various stockholders

Ref: 48635097

jobs_results.title: IT Security Lead
jobs_results.description:
An exciting opportunity to with a leading multinational firm.

Our client is a leading technology firm with a strong presence in Singapore. They are currently looking for an experienced IT Security Lead.

Description

As an IT Security Lead, you will be responsible for :
• Recommending solution, implementing, testing and reviewing the firms information security in order to protect information and prevent unauthorised access.
• Informing users about security measures, potential threats while implementing security measures and monitoring the information systems assets.
• Leading in the development and enforcement of Information Security policies, procedures and standards.
• Ensuring compliance through periodic security audits while assessing the impacts on system modifications and technological advances.
• Ensuring systems meets the mandatory risk based technical, operational, and management information security control requirements.
• Participating in incident management and ensuring... business continuity.

Profile

As a successful applicant, you will have a Degree in Computer Science or related field backed by relevant Security certification such as CISSP. You will have at least 8 years experience in System or Network Administration backed by at least 3 years experience in Information Security Risk Management, Audit and Vulnerability Assessment.

You will have strong technical aptitude with a specialisation in design, implementation and review of application information security architecture, engineering and process.

Job Offer
• Permanent role
• Attractive salary package

jobs_results.title: Business Analyst
jobs_results.company_name: Tescom (singapore) Software Systems Testing Pte Ltd.
jobs_results.description:
We are looking for an experienced and passionate Business Analyst to join our team! As a Member of the team, you will have the opportunity to work on new and exciting projects and develop your career.

JOB SUMMARY:

You will be responsible to involved in the requirement study and gathering, testing, and driving a smooth deployment, adoption and support the ongoing operations of the project. You shall be able to actively define and analyses Client’s business requirements to achieve improvement and optimization.

RESPONSIBILITIES:

· Identify and define the specific requirements by assessing.

· Ensure that the COTS software/system can meet the needs.

· In charge of any of the efforts needed for customization and highlight the impact to the teams.

· Ensure that if bespoke software is required, the development environment that is needed to support the Agile development (e.g. project management tools, development tools, programming language, etc.), the estimated number of teams, team... dependencies (if there is a need for multiple teams), each team’s composition, number of iterations, and overall effort required to develop the Application Software to achieve the desired outcome.

· Develop and sustain solid relationships with client personnel and identify opportunities to provide additional services.

· Contribute to requirements analysis and report findings in a clear, logical, and concise manner.

· Interact with client peers to understand their IT and business environment, challenges, and strengths.

· Help client's pinpoint their business challenges through interviews, data analysis and the documentation of findings.

· Assist in writing detailed specifications for the development team.

SKILL AND EXPERIENCE:

· Min Diploma in Business, Computer Science, Information Technology, and other Engineering discipline would be advantageous.

· Min 3 years’ working experience as a Business Analyst, Scrum Master, Product Owner or equivalent in Agile projects and prefer with shipping Domains experiences.

· Must have a Certified Scrum Product Owner or Certified Scrum Master or equivalent

jobs_results.title: Specialist - Security Analyst- SOC, SIEM, cyber Security
jobs_results.description:
• Provide security alerts and incidents monitoring of systems
• Provide support and diagnose potential security incidents and subsequent reviews
• Ensure incident handling process are being handled from detection to remediation
• Detect and identify inconsistencies or pattern that could indicate complex cyber attacks
• Provide accurate escalation of potential security incidents in line with documented processes
• Refine and develop cyber security dashboard to continuously improve security situational awareness
• Develop, refine and maintain SOC policies, processes and procedures

At least 3 year experience working in SOC environment or in an operational role with cyber security focus

Demonstrate technical qualities in identify alert source and triage security events.

Ability to read and understand system and network traffic data including security event logs, system logs, application logs, etc.

Knowledge of SIEM system

Ability for multitasking and working accurately at the same... time

Effective communication and report writing skills.

Strong analytical and logical thinking skills

Ability to work in rotating shifts including weekends
• Experience in malware analysis
• Security Incident Response
• Expert knowledge in conducting Triage
• Experience in anti-malware, Advanced Threat Protection, SIEM, Logs of security devices like Firewall, IDS, IPS, Proxy etc
• Good to have SANS certification

Preferred SANS GCIH or other equivalent Security certification/accreditation

Good understanding of Unix and Windows operating system

Shift Timing :

7am -4pm

3pm-11:00pm

11:00pm-7:00pm

jobs_results.title: Information Security Analyst - Singapore
jobs_results.description:
Job Description

Fortinet Team is looking for an Information Security Analyst to join the Corporate Information Security team in its Singapore office. This is a highly technical role, assessing risks, monitoring and responding to security events, and working with leaders across Fortinet offices in the region to continue maturing Fortinet security posture and compliance.

Responsibilities
• As a member of the Global Security Operations team, you will monitor logs, review alerts and investigate events and incidents of apparent security breaches leveraging SIEM, SOAR and other tools, and following procedures.
• Develop SOC processes and playbooks, and implement alerts, reports and dashboards to identify threats and incidents.
• Collect, review, and analyze security logs, recognize problems by identifying abnormalities and reporting violations.
• Coach and assist system administrators, product and application developers and system users to ensure that appropriate controls are implemented... and operating effectively in accordance with policies.
• Ensure compliance to required standards, procedures, guidelines and processes.

Requirements
• More than 3 years of experience in Information Technology or Information Security role.
• Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Security or related field.
• SOC/NOC experience desired. Excellent verbal, written and interpersonal communication skills as well as attention to detail.
• Previous experience in an information systems or network administration role.
• Knowledge and experience working with various information security frameworks (ISO/IEC 27001, NIST 800-53, COBIT, etc) and regulatory frameworks (SOX, PCI-DSS 3.2, HIPAA, GDPR, etc.)
• Working knowledge of information security control technologies including access control, cryptography, vulnerability management, SIEM/log management, ID/IPS, and penetration test.
• Working knowledge on information technologies including Linux, Windows, VMWare, MySQL, MSSQL, Oracle, etc.
• Working knowledge of network protocols, DNS, and networking devices - routers, VPNs, proxies, firewalls.
• Demonstrate ability to engage and collaborate with employees, presenting a friendly, approachable demeanor to leverage security to help others succeed.
• Proficient in English verbal and written.
• A certification in one or more of the following desirable: CISSP/CISA, CISM, CRISC/ISO 27001 Lead-Audit/VCP/CCSP.

Fortinet is an Equal Opportunity employer.

We will only notify shortlisted candidates.

Fortinet will not entertain any unsolicited resumes, please refrain from sending them to any Fortinet employees or Fortinet email aliases. Should any Agency submit any resumes to Fortinet, these resumes if considered, will be assumed to have been given by the Agency free of any related fees/charges

jobs_results.title: Production Support Analyst
Senior QA Analyst - Automation - Selenium - Banking
jobs_results.description:
• Solution-focused QA tester, assisting in software quality assurance to enhance testing processes to run test efficiently.
• Analyze requirement and specification to create automation test cases for system under test.
• Perform regression testing.
• Document issues/bug report on each case.
• Work closely with managers, team leaders and software development members to ensure that bugs found are fixed before system release.
• Ensure accuracy and completeness of system documentation such as functional specification and user guide.

Qualifications:
• Diploma/ Degree in Computer Science or any other related discipline from a recognize education institution.
• 5 years of relevant working experience in Software Testing.
• In-depth knowledge of QA and testing methodology.
• Experience in writing test specifications (plans, cases, script, data), test document, defect analysis, tracking and reporting.
• Strong knowledge with automated testing tools such as UFT, Selenium, HP Load Runner and... JMeter.

For more information, please visit to www.gmprecruit.com and search for Job Reference: 9177
We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.
